def_en: If there is a plurality of things, a number of them exist.

def_cn: （超过其他任何一方的）多数
def_en: If a candidate, political party, or idea has the support of a plurality of people, they have more support than any other candidate, party, or idea.

def_cn: （指选举中获胜者得到的不及其他所有候选人得票总和的）相对多数（票）
def_en: A plurality in an election is the number of votes that the winner gets, when this is less than the total number of votes for all the other candidates.

def_cn: （指选举中获得最多票数的候选人与得票数第二的候选人之间的）票数差额
def_en: A plurality in an election is the difference in the number of votes between the candidate who gets the most votes and the candidate who comes second.
